title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 190.5 - Verification of information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 190.5 - Verification of information

State Regulations

No apartment information vendor or employee thereof shall
refer a prospective tenant to an apartment unless the availability of such
apartment is verified by the vendor or employee at the time of
referral. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
190.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
